replies.body: Please Riot, replace the 3 refunds per lifetime by 2 per lifetime + 1 per season...
Damn riot take notes.

I agree... When I started League my friend told me and 5 of my friends that he read online that they were replaced every month or 2... So we used them within the first week trying new champions and lost them forever...
LOL!!!!
Please, this needs to happen.
i agree
Wholeheartedly agree.  Give us more Refunds!  or at least give an option to purchase more refunds!(ironic I know)
Maybe with IP. That way you can earn the points over time to get your refund.
I Agree with this completely.
**UPVOTE THIS!!!**
OMG YES
They aren't posting them anymore. No idea why... http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/2f8ppg/september_champion_skin_sale_schedule/cky9bpn
Is it to early to call the MVP of these worlds? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jNz4d4atn40
I also wanna know, have you known yet?
I would like to know also, that would be nice.
its because they love when we use their customer support to get partial refunds when they don't post what they'll put on sale if you bought it at full price b4 the sale actually happens.

{{champion:126}} Skarner!? SKARNER!!? Are you ok? Answer me!!

{{champion:72}} **Ugh...Yeah. I am fine. Lost my tail and one of my claws, but that can be repaired. But it over right?**

{{champion:126}} I can't tell. But once that dust settles we will know for..no.

{{champion:72}} **!!!**

{{champion:6}} **Damage to great. Sleep mode activating. Initiating self-repair. Good-bye.**

{{champion:126}} He switched with Urgot!!! Where did he go!?

{{champion:112}} **Gravity Field**

{{champion:126}} Can't move.

{{champion:112}} **I must admit you would of got me if Urgot wasn't nearby. But even then, Skarner's impale was so strong that I had to leave my arm behind during the switch. It a good thing I turn off my pain receptors or that would of hurt.**

{{champion:126}} But now you are down an arm, and your hextecth core was destroyed along with it. 

{{champion:112}} **You know long it will take to build a new arm? Like 2 hours. Wait a second..I'm right handed...3 HOURS!!!!**


{{champion:126}} You seem to think you will be leaving here Viktor.

{{champion:112}} **And you seem to still have a big mouth. Let me fix that for you. Chaos Storm**

{{champion:126}} AAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHH

{{champion:112}} **Hurts huh? To bad you can't turn it off as easily as I can.**


{{champion:72}} **JAYCE!!!!**

{{champion:112}} **It just you and me now Skarner. I will give you one last chance Skarner. Come back to me or everyone here will die.**

{{champion:72}} **I will not join you Viktor.**

{{champion:112}} **Very Well. After I win this battle here. After I have destroyed everything and everyone here, I will take your body back and stripped all your thoughts, will, and emotions away from you and but it all on little computer so that I can torture it forever.**

{{champion:72}} **Let's finish this Viktor**
now i want an animation of this story to go along with a battlecast skarner skin.
With the animation from "A New Dawn" :D
he gets so many downvotes :(
The downvoting bots are just jealous of the epic story telling.
There just jealous, BRING ON THE DOWN VOTES!!!!!
Finally, I thought you f{{champion:6}} about a certain someone.
Well not {{champion:1}} more.
Stop selling more Tristana Skins, we don't want to encourage more people to play her.
If the nerf from the PBE comes through we should be fine, her attack speed is getting pushed of a veritable cliff...
I have no idea why they are nerfing her, I have not seen a single game where she carried any harder then any other feed adc.
Sales calendar for October, please...
30rp short of kha zix{{item:3070}}
Like if you cry every time. ;(

mario "jump man" mario

it pains me to say but mario rip u have been one of my favorite characters in gaming  until i found Mathew Patrick (or game theroy(https://www.youtube.com/user/MatthewPatrick13) (https://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_detailpage&v=jcxW_ciP5R4 (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jcxW_ciP5R4)) there is ur proof btw

Damnit, I wanted a Neon Strike Vi skin.
What are the chances... I just bought Vi yesterday. And I was so close to buying her police officer skin right away.... Whoof :P Woulda been like {{champion:14}} {{summoner:11}}
Can you please bring the sale schedules back i would be so much more willing to spend my money when i know there is something I want coming up
Riot should give us three refunds per season. Of course these refunds would not carry over to the next. I mean, if three is too much then give us 1 or 2.
1 rp away from vi skin... free 1 rp please riot
1 rp away for vi skin. Riot give me that one rp?
